text: The 2017 Boys' Youth European Volleyball Championship was played in Slovakia and Hungary from 22 to 30 April 2017. The top six teams qualified for the 2017 Youth World Championship. ==Participating teams== * Hosts ** ** * Qualified through 2017 Boys' Youth European Volleyball Championship Qualification ** ** ** ** ** ** ** ** ** ** ==Pools composition== {|class="wikitable" width=350 |- !width=50%|Pool A !width=50%|Pool B |- | | |- | | |- | | |- | | |- | | |- | | |} ==Preliminary round== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: left;" |- |width=10px bgcolor=#ccffcc| ||Qualified for the Semifinals |- |width=10px bgcolor=#dfefff| ||Qualified for the 5th–8th Semifinals |} ===Pool I=== *Venue: Győr, Hungary |} |} ===Pool II=== *Venue: Púchov, Slovakia |} |} ==Final round== ===5th–8th place=== ====5th–8th semifinals==== |} ====7th place match==== |} ====5th place match==== |} ===Final=== ====Semifinals==== |} ====3rd place match==== |} ====Final==== |} ==Final standing== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" !width=40|Rank !width=180|Team |- align=center bgcolor=#ccffcc | |style="text-align:left;"| |- align=center bgcolor=#ccffcc | |style="text-align:left;"| |- align=center bgcolor=#ccffcc | |style="text-align:left;"| |- align=center bgcolor=#ccffcc |4 |style="text- align:left;"| |- align=center bgcolor=#ccffcc |5 |style="text-align:left;"| |- align=center bgcolor=#ccffcc |6 |style="text-align:left;"| |- align=center |7 |style="text-align:left;"| |- align=center |8 |style="text-align:left;"| |- align=center |9 |style="text-align:left;"| |- align=center |10 |style="text- align:left;"| |- align=center |11 |style="text-align:left;"| |- align=center |12 |style="text-align:left;"| |} {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: left;" |- |width=10px bgcolor=#ccffcc| ||Qualified for the 2017 Boys' U19 World Championship |- |} {| style="text-align: center; margin-top: 2em; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto" |- |12–man Roster |- |Jan Pavlíček, Radim Šulc, Ondřej Piskáček, Josef Polák, Filip Humler, Miroslav Drozen, Jan Svoboda, Lukáš Vašina, Michal Roháček, Pavel Horák, Marek Šotola, Jakub Varous |- |Head Coach |- |Jiří Zach |} ==Awards== At the conclusion of the tournament, the following players were selected as the tournament dream team. *Most Valuable Player : Adis Lagumdzija *Best Setter : Ondřej Piskáček *Best Outside Spikers : Batuhan Avci : Davide Gardini *Best Middle Blockers : Lorenzo Cortesia : Vitalii Dikarev *Best Opposite Spiker : Marek Šotola *Best Libero : Filippo Federici ==References== ==External links== *Official website Category:Boys' Youth European Volleyball Championship European Boys' Youth Championship Volleyball Volleyball Category:International volleyball competitions hosted by Hungary Category:International volleyball competitions hosted by Slovakia Category:Sport in Győr Category:April 2017 sports events in Europe
title: 2017 Boys' U19 Volleyball European Championship
